home_header_title: Learn to code like a real developer.
home_header_first_text: Being a developer isn't just about knowing a technology. It's about knowing how to solve problems, adapt, and progress quickly.
home_header_second_text: Learn to understand any technology, choose the right tools, and work like a pro, even outside of tutorials.
home_social_proof_title: Djason Chery unlocked his developer potential thanks to Seelearn.
home_social_proof_first_text: More than 10 projects completed on different technologies in just a few months.
home_social_proof_second_text: Trained to learn a new technology in just a few days.
home_social_proof_tertiary_text: Capable of leading projects in a team or as a freelancer.
contact_title: More questions? Want to chat? We're here!
contact_description: Contact us via this form and we will do our best to respond as soon as possible.
community_description_1: By joining Seelearn, you will never be alone. You benefit from free personalized support, private livestreams to ask all your questions, and an active community ready to help you whenever you're stuck.
community_description_2: We motivate each other, share our successes, and even find partners to launch projects together.
community_card_skool_text: The entire Seelearn community is here to welcome and help you, whatever your problem.
community_card_live_text: Every week, Seelearn offers exclusive livestreams where you can learn even more.
community_card_tiktok_text: Our TikTok platform gives you access to livestream excerpts, tutorials, or free excerpts from our training.
community_card_youtube_text: Our YouTube channel gives you access to free excerpts from our Seelearn training as well as livestream replays.
faq_title: Got a question? Seekode is here!
faq_q1_title: Is this training suitable for complete beginners?
faq_q1_text: Yes. It's designed for people of all levels who want to progress quickly, even if they're starting from scratch. No need to have attended a school or bootcamp. The modules are designed so that it's easy to determine what you already know and go directly to what's essential for you.

review_1_content: Nicolas was my trainer at La Manu, and I learned a lot from him. Even outside of class hours, he took the time to explain and guide me. Thanks to his advice and support, I progressed very quickly and was able to successfully complete my career change as a web developer. Before that, I was a freelance editor/VFX artist, and his teaching really made a difference.
review_2_content: A complete training that doesn't just teach you to code, but to understand the code. Honestly, thank you so much, I really have everything I need to tackle any technology without worry! Thanks!
review_3_content: This training allowed me to successfully complete my career change. The content is clear and well-structured, and I gained confidence throughout the journey. I'm now comfortable with several technologies and able to quickly adapt to new tools and environments. Amazing! Go for it without hesitation!
